actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 17 of title 38, United States Code, so as to authorize reimbursement for hospital care or medical service for any disability of a veteran who has a total service-connected disability permanent in nature.

summary.text: Authorizes the reimbursement for hospital care or medical service for any disability of a veteran who has a total service-connected disability permanent in nature. (Adds 38 U.S.C. 628)

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 17 of title 38, United States Code, so as to authorize reimbursement for hospital care or medical service for any disability of a veteran who has a total service-connected disability permanent in nature.
